meanings.definition: A ruler or monarch with great power and authority.
meanings.sent1: The powerful potentate commanded the entire kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The potentate's decree was law in the land.
meanings.sent3: The potentate's crown was so heavy, it kept slipping off his head!
meanings.sent4: She ruled the company with the iron fist of a potentate.
meanings.sent5: The potentate's presence filled the room with an aura of authority.

meanings.definition: A person who possesses great influence or control.
meanings.sent1: As a potentate in the industry, he could make or break careers.
meanings.sent2: The political potentate had connections in every corner of the world.
meanings.sent3: The fashion potentate always knew the latest trends before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: She was a potentate in the art world, her opinion could make an artist famous overnight.
meanings.sent5: The tech potentate's innovations changed the way people lived their lives.
